module: Module-level Comment: The 'topaudio_test' module acts as a testbench for the 'topaudio' module. It achieves this by providing 'clock' and 'miso' signals, internally managed by time-staged initial blocks, to simulate and test the system behavior under varying inputs. The module also utilizes internal wires connected to different ports of 'topaudio', creating a communication link for test signals and potential output tracking. It acts as the test environment to validate the 'topaudio' module functionality.
